channel.title: Pits command wont work like i want it to!

item.title: Pits command wont work like i want it to!
item.dc:creator: @Sin2 Sin_
item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:9, topic:155637”][quote author=Sin_ link=topic=212391.msg1856351#msg1856351 date=1193774151]

if (command.startsWith("pits")) {
if (combatLevel >= 80) {
teleportToX = 3487;
teleportToY = 9493;
sendMessage("Welcome to the Queen's lair! WARNING BE AWARE OF HIGH HIT'S!");
} 
else if (combatLevel <= [b]80[/b])
{            
sendMessage("You need to be level 80 or above to enter here.");
sendMessage("Go back to the shantay pass and train on moss giants and barrows");
}
}

Tell if you get a bracket error.

Edit: Sorry about the poor indentation.
[/quote]

else if (combatLevel <= 80)

That should be 79.[/quote]

Shut up, I didn’t notice :S

Read full topic

item.title: Pits command wont work like i want it to!
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

Well i have added this

if (command.startsWith("pits")) { if (combatLevel >= 80) { teleportToX = 3487; teleportToY = 9493; sendMessage("Welcome to the Queen's lair! WARNING BE AWARE OF HIGH HIT'S!"); } else { sendMessage("You need to be level 80 or above to enter here."); sendMessage("Go back to the shantay pass and train on moss giants and barrows"); } }

Well it teleports you there… if you are level 80+
BUT!
if you are blow 80 it dont

but i dont get this message
You need to be level 80 or above to enter here.

Anyone?
